name: Tum-Tum: An Unexpected Diet
description:
Tum-Tum is a fat cat. He’s so fat he can barely move. Tum-Tum decides to call a shaman to cure him from his anxiety. And help him to feel better.

The shaman will bring Tum-Tum back in time in several occasions to catch the mouse in the house. Each time Tum-Tum visits the house, a ghost of himself appears and follow his past movements. Tum-Tum Will have to avoid every Tum-Tum past, and eat all the mice. Good luck Tum-Tum!

Controls

Move: Keyboard arrows / Skip scenes: spacebar / Reset: “R” button

Credits

• Alice Guiet: Game design / Level design / Story design

• Maxime Barre: Programming / Integration / Back-end testing

• Music Credit: Through The Mist - Free Dark Mystical Fantasy Orchestral Music
